item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Value comparers
item.description: "EF Core has a new feature called change tracking."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Value conversions
item.description: "Property values can be converted from one type to another in the database."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Backing fields
item.description: "A backing field is a property of an EF class."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Sequences
item.description: "A sequence generates unique, sequential numeric values in the database. Sequences are not associated with a specific table, and multiple tables can be set up to draw values from the same sequence."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Inheritance
item.description: "inheritance support for Entity Framework (EF) is available."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Indexes and constraints
item.description: "An index is a set of columns that can be used to retrieve data from a data store."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Relationships - Overview
item.description: "This document provides a simple introduction to the representation of relationships in object models and relational databases, including how EF Core maps between the two."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Shadow and indexer properties
item.description: "This article describes the use of shadow properties in the EF Core model."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Generated values
item.description: "EF Core generates values for database columns."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Keys
item.description: "A key is a unique identifier for an entity instance."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Entity properties
item.description: "Each entity type in your model has a set of properties, which EF Core will read and write from the database. If you're using a relational database, entity properties map to table columns."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Entity types
item.description: "EF Core includes a DbSet of a type on your context."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Overview
item.description: "EF Core uses a metadata model to describe how the application's entity types are mapped to the underlying database."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - DbContext configuration and initialization - Context pooling
item.description: "EF Core can pool your context instances: when you dispose your context, EF Core resets its state and stores it in an internal pool; when a new instance is next requested, that pooled instance is returned instead of setting up a new one."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - DbContext configuration and initialization - Overview
item.description: "This article shows basic patterns for initialization and configuration of a DbContext instance."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Releases and planning (roadmap) - EF Core 6.0 - Breaking changes
item.description: "The following API and behavior changes have the potential to break existing applications updating to EF Core 6.0."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Releases and planning (roadmap) - EF Core 6.0 - What's new?
item.description: "EF Core 6.0 has shipped to NuGet. This page contains an overview of interesting changes introduced in this release."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Releases and planning (roadmap) - EF Core 6.0 - High-level plan
item.description: "We are planning for the release of Entity Framework Core (EF Core) 6.0."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Releases and planning (roadmap) - EF Core 7.0 - Breaking changes
item.description: "EF Core 7 has been released and is now available for download."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Releases and planning (roadmap) - EF Core 7.0 - What's new?
item.description: "EF Core 7.0 (EF7) was released in November 2022."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Releases and planning (roadmap) - EF Core 7.0 - High-level plan
item.description: "As described in the planning process, we have gathered input from stakeholders into a plan for Entity Framework Core 7.0 (EF Core 7.0.) For brevity, EF Core 7.0 is also referred to as just EF7."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Releases and planning (roadmap) - EF Core 8.0 - Breaking changes
item.description: "EF Core 8 has been released and is now available for download."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Releases and planning (roadmap) - EF Core 8.0 - What's new?
item.description: "EF Core 8.0 (EF8) was released in November 2023."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Releases and planning (roadmap) - EF Core 9.0 - Breaking changes
item.description: "EF Core 9 has been released and is now available for download."

item.description: "EF Core 8 has been released and is now available for download."

item.description: "EF Core 8.0 (EF8) was released in November 2023."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a Model - Introduction to relationships
item.description: "This document provides a simple introduction to the representation of relationships in object models and relational databases, including how EF Core maps between the two."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Relationships - Glossary
item.description: "There are a number of terms used to describe relationships. It is not necessary to understand all these terms up-front. Refer back here as needed when reading the relationships documentation pages."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Relationships - Mapping attributes
item.description: "OnModelCreating implements the OnModelCreating mapping attribute."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Relationships - Conventions
item.description: "EF Core uses a set of conventions when discovering and building a model based on entity type classes."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Relationships - Navigations
item.description: "This paper describes the use of navigations in the Entity Framework (EF)."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Relationships - Foreign and principal keys
item.description: "One-to-one and one-to-many relationships are composed of two one-to-many relationships, each of which is itself defined by a foreign key referencing a principal key."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Relationships - Many-to-many
item.description: "Many-to-many relationships are used when any number entities of one entity type is associated with any number of entities of the same or another entity type."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Relationships - One-to-one
item.description: "One-to-one relationships are used when one entity is associated with at most one other entity. For example, a Blog has one BlogHeader, and that BlogHeader belongs to a single Blog."

item.title: Entity Framework - Entity Framework Core - Create a model - Relationships - One-to-many
item.description: "One-to-many relationships are used when a single entity is associated with any number of other entities."
